title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Combine pasta, pancetta, and egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve.

title: Chicken Curry
description: A flavorful chicken curry simmered with onions, tomatoes, and aromatic spices.
instructions: Add curry powder and stir for 1 min.
Add tomatoes and cook until soft.
Add chicken pieces and cook until browned.
Pour in coconut milk and simmer until chicken is cooked.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A quick and healthy stir fry with mixed vegetables and soy sauce.
instructions: Chop all vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Heat sesame oil in a wok.
Stir fry carrots, broccoli, and bell pepper for 5 minutes.
Add soy sauce and toss well.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.
